title: HTML+CSS Level 9 — Transitions & Hover Effects
concept: Use CSS transitions, transforms, and hover states for interactive UI.

challenges.title: Button Hover Transition
challenges.description: Create a button that smoothly changes background color and scales up slightly when hovered.
challenges.outputDescription: On hover, the button animates instead of snapping.
examples: Use transition on background-color and transform: scale(1.05) on hover.
challenges.starterCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>Hover Button</title>
  <style>
    /* Add transition to .btn and transform on .btn:hover */
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <button class="btn">Submit</button>
</body>
</html>

challenges.title: Card Lift on Hover
challenges.description: Create a card that appears to "lift" off the page on hover with a shadow and slight upward movement.
challenges.outputDescription: Card with box-shadow and translateY on hover, animated smoothly.
examples: Default: flat; Hover: bigger shadow, move up by a few pixels.

challenges.title: Link Underline Animation
challenges.description: Create a navigation link with a custom underline that animates from left to right on hover using ::after pseudo-element.
challenges.outputDescription: Link appears normal; on hover, underline slides in.
examples: Use position:relative on a, and ::after with width transition.
challenges.starterCode: Dashboard

challenges.title: Rotating Icon on Hover
challenges.description: Create an icon (you can use emoji or an <i> element) that rotates 180 degrees when hovered, with a smooth animation.
challenges.outputDescription: Icon rotates with transform: rotate(); and transition.
challenges.starterCode: ⏷

challenges.title: Image Zoom on Hover
challenges.description: Create an image container where the image slightly zooms in on hover but stays within rounded corners (use overflow:hidden).
challenges.outputDescription: Card-like image that zooms in without overflowing.
examples: Container has border-radius and overflow:hidden; img scales on hover.
